name: A different planet (1xa)
description:
This is my first game jam. I hope you like it!

Instructions:

WASD or arrow keys to move

Space to shoot

Don't let any bullets hit your window

Kill the enemies to move on to the next level

Credits:

Music - Alexandr Zhelanov, https://soundcloud.com/alexandr-zhelanov

Hardmoon / Arjen Schumacher, https://opengameart.org/content/deep-space

Fonts - Nimble Beasts Collective, https://nimblebeastscollective.itch.io/magosfonts

https://cooltext.com/Logo-Design-Spaced-Out
